price: (Nkͻmhyεni, Yudafoͻ no) rebisa wo Zul-Qar’nain ho asεm. Kasε: “Mεka ne ho asεm akyerε mo:
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِي ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿan dhī al-qarnayni qul sa-atlū ʿalaykum min'hu dhik'ran
